Text: Houston VisitHello I hope the holidays were good to you and the new year is starting out good I will be in Houston next week and I would like to stop by to see you on Tuesday afternoon January nd Please let know if this meets your schedule If not I will be in town Wednesday and Thursday morning Let me know which day meets your schedule Looking forward to seeing you Thanks Jack Lollis Pipeline Equipment Inc fax email ipelineequipment website wwwpipelineequipmentcom

ThanksGentlemen Thanks for the time that you spent with me last week I appreciate the opportunity to visit with each of you If Pipeline Equipment Inc can be of assistance just give me a call If I am unavailable you may contact Mike Kimball General Manager or Tommy Hudspeth Director of Sales Thanks again for your time Regards Jack Lollis Pipeline Equipment Inc wwwpipelineequipmentcom
